item.title: fireworks from highway
item.description: 19:00 Saturday 19 August 2017 JST 89975 / 8272.8 Fireworks just started over yonder near the highway. According to Underneath It All (NIN podcast) I should listen to the Phoenix 1991 Lollapalooza Nine Inch Nails show where something melted and killed their audio so they just destroyed equipment. https://vimeo.com/17074248 https://ninlive.com/shows/1991/19910718.html
